testCase.requirementText: File size mets/fileSec/fileGrp/file/@SIZE Size of the referenced file in bytes.
testCase.description: The SIZE-attribute is optional according to the METS.xsd but mandatory in CSIP69. Therefor it should be tested if it exists. Also the file size to be validated with the value.

rule.description: The MUST exist a SIZE-attribute in the file-element. This is one of the cases where many files can have a missing attribute. The validation tool should be able give a number of occurences with the possibility to get a list with the occurences

error.message: There MUST exist a SIZE-attribute in the file-element (so that the size of the referenced file can be recorded)

package.name: file_missing_SIZE_attribute
package.description: A package where the SIZE-attribute is missing

rule.description: There should be a check if the information of size of the file is correct. This is one of the cases where many files can have a wrong documentation. The validation tool should be able give a number of occurences with the possibility to get a list with the occurences

error.message: The size of the file is not the size that is given in the SIZE-attribute

package.name: mdRef_wrong_SIZE
package.description: A package where the wrong size is given on 2 different files
